      • processCommands

        public boolean processCommands(java.lang.String command)
        Command list: p [color] - inform what turn it is t [color] - inform my turn. Used in the beginning of the game d - open draw prompt window
        Overrides:
        processCommands in class Spectator
        Parameters:
        command - command from server
        Returns:
        true if valid player command
